X-OPID.description: Command starts operation with this ID

X-OP-TIMEOUT.description: Timeout in Milliseconds, Requester can assume Operation will be finished(success or fail), meaning underlying System will guarantee that it should reach consistent state after that timeout

X-OP-START-TIME.description: Reference starting time of Operation, especially to use X-OP-TIMEOUT

entityId.description: Aggregation Id of related Default Entity, UUIDs can be used but not mandatory

version.description: Aggregation Version of related Default Entity
